includedLanguages.title: Include languages
includedLanguages.description: Spoken languages to ZIM, one ZIM per language and/or all in a `mul` ZIM.

withoutLanguageVariants.title: Without Language Variants
withoutLanguageVariants.description: Exclude languages with Country variant. For example `en_CA` will not be ZIMed with this argument.

createMul.title: Create `mul` ZIM
createMul.description: Create a ZIM file with all languages (by default, scraper creates only one ZIM per language)

mulOnly.title: Only `mul` ZIM
mulOnly.description: Create only `mul` ZIM, skip ZIM files for individual languages
